features: Soft, secure and highly breathable fabric—the most breathable in the line; additional male-specific support in men’s version
High-density, low-profile, low-bulk chamois pad for riders who prefer a minimalist feel
Soft elastic waistband and subtle silicone leg grips eliminate slip and chafe, keeping chamois in place and shorts snug around waist
Soft, subtle silicone leg grips eliminate slip and chafe while securing chamois in place
4.3-oz 79% recycled nylon/21% spandex jersey with HeiQ® Fresh durable odor control. Fabric is certified as bluesign® approved. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn
